Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can accurately draw two students communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can clearly depict the string telephone device with a string connecting two cups, held by each student.
The student can illustrate sound traveling through the string using detailed sound waves or arrows, indicating communication.
The student can effectively show how the device is built using materials such as cups and string, demonstrating understanding of the construction.
The student can clearly illustrate the purpose of the string telephone by showing how it allows communication over a distance.
The student can successfully demonstrate an understanding of how technology enables communication over long distances through their drawing.
CANNOT: The student may occasionally omit minor details such as labels or slightly misalign arrows or sound waves, but these do not detract significantly from the overall understanding.
